name: Clown Game (AntiClux)
description:
Welcome to the most incredibly amazing show on itch!

Clown gets trapped on the tightrope by his two mistresses, who just found out about one another. He must apologise to them, but they have mops. How long will he be able to balance himself whilst avoiding everything that's getting thrown at him?

Clown Game is an endless survival game, made with the sole intent of amusing its creator.
